footer.text: Character Guide • Build: Sayu | Update Date: 10/24/2022 | Editor: Samantha#9907

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value: The Unforged, Serpent Spine, Akuoumaru, Luxurious Sea-Lord, Katsuragikiri Nagamasa, Skyward Pride

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK%|<goblet>Anemo DMG bnous|<circlet>  CRIT Rate or CRIT DMG

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Yoohoo Art - Fuuin Dash
**2)**  Elemental Burst: Yoohoo Art - Mujina Flurry
Despite being a DPS build, ideal rotations will not use Normal Attacks.

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Despite being a high-investment build, a pure Elemental Mastery will perform similarly. Thundersoother is a niche set where Electro aura is maintained, and Lavawalker where Pyro aura is maintained.
